          <title>
            <string language="en">Cooking grill</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kochen des Grills</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cuisine du gril</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cozinhando a grade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cottura della griglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγειρεύοντας σχάρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cocinar la parrilla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the heating element and shiny surface inside a grill heat and cook food.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cooking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grill</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating element</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shiny surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie das Heizelement und die
glänzende Oberfläche innerhalb eines Grills Nahrung erhitzen und 
kochen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment l'élément de 
chauffe et la surface brillante à l'intérieur d'un gril chauffent et
font cuire la nourriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o elemento de 
heating e a superfície brilhante dentro de uma grade aquecem e 
cozinham o alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come l'elemento 
riscaldante e la superficie lucida all'interno di una griglia 
riscaldano e cucinano l'alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς το στοιχείο 
θέρμανσης και η λαμπρή επιφάνεια μέσα σε μια σχάρα θερμαίνουν 
και μαγειρεύουν τα τρόφιμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el elemento de 
calefacción y la superficie brillante dentro de una parrilla 
calientan y cocinan el alimento.</string>
          </description>
